title: HELP
body: Whenever I try to enter a game I get a bug splat message. I have tried  to re-download the game and repair it but nothing seems to work. Which is weird since it was working yesterday for me.

replies.body:
Bugsplats are typically the result of poor interactions with system drivers or hardware. I recommend working through our [Bugsplat Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) as a first step towards troubleshooting this.

Let me know if those steps caused any change.
